metadata.title: CVE-2021-24001 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A compromised content process could have performed session historymanipulations it should not have been able to due to testing infrastructurethat was not restricted to testing-only configurations. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 88.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
